text: Chacachacare Lighthouse is an active lighthouse located in the north part of Chacachacare atop a hill at an elevation of . The tower was built in 1897 in masonry with a cylindrical shape with balcony and lantern which is positioned at a height of above sea level. The tower is painted white and has a height of , the lantern is painted red. The light emits one white flash in a ten seconds period visible up to . ==See also== * List of lighthouses in Trinidad and Tobago ==References== Category:Lighthouses in Trinidad and Tobago
title: Chacachacare Lighthouse
